That was beautiful Moonmist, but i'm not gone yet, not until Yanshosh says
so, because only JP said I would be kicked out, that mail was only so that
just in case I get kicked out, there would be an explanation for my
characters disappearing, so not yet, Gangon is still here for now, but until
then, gangon is in his room thinking about something, okay?...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 08, 2000 2:07 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
>
> * BrightBlade smiled at the fact that she had then been made co-commander
by
> Hell Beast, a very high honor she hoped that she could live up to.
> She saluted sharply towards Hell Beast.*
>
> " Yes, My Lord. As you wish."
>
> * With that she had then looked off towards Gangon but then had not found
> him there, she looked around and then finally spotted him entering some
> strange ship. Was he leaving? Why?
> She looked at him with a bit of concern in her optics but then heard him
say
> good bye before the ship suddenly took off. Then...he was gone.
> BrightBlade looked towards the sky in which she had seen him disappear
into
> and then sighed, her almost missing him already.
> Now she was partnerless and alone, as she had been always before now. It
was
> a feeling that suddenly made her feel a little sad, not being able to hear
> Gangon's comment's on her looks any more and his wacky ways.
> She then turned towards the Maximal ship and look at it, the evening glow
> behind her. It felt different now being alone like this, but a feeling in
> which she would have to get used to now that her partner was gone. Just
> hoping that Gangon would keep his word and return to see her again,
> something that she looked forward too.
> BrightBlade then looked over at Hell Beast.*
>
> " I await your next commend, My Lord."
>
